name: Guns N' Goals
description:
Concept: Football + Third Person Shooter Objetive: Take the ball to the opponent’s goal using your weapon
  • It’s a 1 vs 1 game! You can shoot the ball and your rival :)
  • JetPack and double Jump!!
  • Maybe it has some bugs ( ¯(ツ)/¯ ) but is really a funny game.
  • Developed in UE4 for Windows.
  • Vote it :P
Controls Player 1 : Using mouse.
  • Jump: space
  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Aim : Right Mouse Button
Player 2 : Using gamepad (PS4 controller).
  • Jump: X
  • Move: Left Thumbstick
  • Camera Control: Right Thumbstick
  • Shoot : Right Trigger(R2)
  • Aim: Left Trigger(L2)
Programming
